game.title: Rescue the Princess
game.objective: Rescue the princess from the evil dragon.
game.description: The evil dragon Smaug has kidnapped the princess. The king is offering a reward to anyone who can rescue her.

task.description: Begin your journey by the entrance of the forest, following the marked path.

task.objective: Climb the mountain and find the dragon's lair.
task.description: Scale the mountain and locate Smaug's hideout, hidden in the clouds.
Battle Smaug and save the princess from its lair.

task.objective: Return to the castle with the princess.
task.description: Bring the princess back to the castle for your reward and the king's gratitude.
